rally.1: 16 artists take part in this rally around VTubers
rally.2: After making a purchase (minimum 2‚Ç¨) from a participant booth, scan the QR code to get a stamp
rally.3: Once you've collected {{minimumStampsCount}} stamps and visited both halls, head over to Sedeto's booth to get a reward!
rally.4: This year, try to win a holographic card by getting all the stamps!
rally.5: Once you get your reward, enter the draw to win a shikishi from Sedeto!
rally.6: You can replay as many times as you like while rewards last!

contest.alreadyRegistered: You are already registered to the contest
contest.description: Join our big contest at 4pm every day and get a chance to win a shikishi created by Sedeto!

requirements.noRally: Complete a rally to take part
requirements.oneMore: Complete another rally to take part

contest.title: 4pm Exclusive Contest

reward.disclaimer: Rewards are available while supplies last.

rally.description: Collect stamps to get one or more exclusive rewards.
rally.title: Stamp Rally

submissions.title: How do I claim the prizes?
submissions.description.1: To get one or more prizes depending on the tier reached, submit your rally using the button below.
submissions.description.2: After submission, go to the organizer's booth (Arqo & Sedeto, Hall 6, R687) to collect your prize on site!

stamps.title: How do I get stamps?
stamps.description: To get a stamp, buy a product at a participating booth and ask for the rally's QR code. Scan it using the button at the bottom right of the application! The minimum purchase amount is 2‚Ç¨. Maximum one stamp per artist.

replay.title: Can you do a rally again?
replay.description: You can play as many times as you want! However, it is forbidden to play with multiple devices simultaneously.

rules.1: The rally will be completely digital and won't need any 4G, since you loaded it once. The access link will be there and on the booth.
rules.2: The rally features 16 booths. You'll need 10 stamps to complete your card. You'll need to visit the two halls (5 and 6) to complete your rally anyway, so prepare to walk!
rules.3: To get one stamp from a booth, you'll need to make purchases for 2‚Ç¨ or more on said booth.
rules.4: Once you've completed your rally card, you'll need to reach Sedeto's booth (Hall 6, R687) to claim your reward. Ask Sedeto's team to validate your card on your smartphone and enter the raffle to draw your prize!
rules.5: The main rewards are one of the exclusive postcards made by the featured artists of the rally, representing different popular vtubers, made like a signed original shikishi piece. There are 17 different postcards, you can chose the one you want! Each design will be in limited quantities everyday in order to give chance to everyone.
rules.6: You can win one, two or three of the exclusive postcards in the raffle!
rules.7: We'll draw another big prize at Sedeto's booth everyday at 4PM: One medium shikishi that Sedeto will draw for you with your oshi on it! You'll need to be there and to have validated a card the same day to get a chance to win.
rules.8: You can enter the rally several time to get more rewards!
rules.9: If we encounter any big issues, those rules may change in order to make it work at the best to be enjoyable and fair with everyone.
saveSubmissionQuestion: Do you want to save your submissions?

stampGoals.getToPremiumCardReward_other: Only {{count}} more stamps for a chance to get <1><icon/>a special holographic card</1>!
stampGoals.scanFromMinorHall: Warning: To validate your rally, you have to scan a stamp from a booth located in hall 5A. Why? To ensure equity between both halls.

submissionsGoesHere: When you finish the rally, you will find information here about claiming your rewards!

submitTerms: This code is valid for the entire duration of the convention, you may get your reward at any day of the convention, if you want to try to get cards that are out-of-stock for the day.
